text: Nihsansaya, je loka kaphira (inkari) aheta, tyanni jara allahacya siksa-yatane (azaba) pasuna sutaka honyakarita, dharativara je kahi ahe, te sarvacya sarva danda mhanuna de'una takale ani tevadheca anakhi ghe'una ale, taridekhila kayamaticya divasi azabapasuna sutaka honyakarita kabula kele janara nahi, ani tyancyakarita duhkhadayaka siksa-yataneca krama jari rahila
